sentences.sContent: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.sCn: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.sContent: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
They doctored the prints, deepening the lines to make her look as awful as possible.
sentences.sCn: 他们窜改了照片，加深皱纹使她尽可能地难看。

synos.tran: 修理；窜改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位

words.tran: 博士的；博士学位的；有博士学位的

trans.tranOther: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill
to dishonestly change something in order to gain an advantage
